titleStmt.title: The English ape, the Italian imitation, the footesteppes of Fraunce VVherein is explaned, the wilfull blindnesse of subtill mischiefe, the striuing for starres, the catching of mooneshine: and the secrete found of many hollow hearts. by W.R.
titleStmt.author: Rankins, William, fl. 1587.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Robert Robinson, and are to be sold by Richard Iones dwelling at Holborne Conduit at the signe of the Rose and Crowne,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 20698+ on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Holborne Conduit at the signe of the Rose
